name: Fist of love
description:
This is an independent game of adventure.

To be a great pugilist, you need to defeat and conquer the opponents who are holding you back on your way to achieving your goal of being the champion.

Come on! Please fight with your loving fist for the better tomorrow!



Story

As a guess fighter, your goal is to become the king of guessing game.

To achieve this goal, you need to overcome the many opponents who are holding you back and let them know how powerful your punch is.



GamePlay

By choosing the cards of stone, scissors and cloth. To judge the victory or defeat with the stones, scissors and cloth of the opponent. Stone can be better than scissors and scissors than cloth and cloth can be better than stone. You need to win a lot of guessing game to defeat your opponent and win the final victory. If you haven't guessed the opponent's fist, you will not be able to defeat your opponent.



Game features

1, simple guessing game.

2, exquisite CG



Numerous achievements

We will provide many achievements for players to collect.
